metadata.title: CVE-2023-3363 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure issue in Gitlab CE/EE affecting all versions from13.6 prior to 15.11.10, all versions from 16.0 prior to 16.0.6, allversions from 16.1 prior to 16.1.1, resulted in the Sidekiq log includingwebhook tokens when the log format was set to `default`.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
